name: Eclipsis
description:
After the eclipse started, our world became infested with blood-sucking monsters. The vampire-hunting order was founded by the church to purify infected cities and villages. Our hero, also a hunter, came to one of those cities, but ended up becoming a vampire himself. Somehow he managed to save his mind and decided to destroy the evil no matter what.

A small demo of our project on Unity for school conference. Four 10-graders tried themselves in gamedev (Ryabinin Oleg, Bulanov Juriy, Isaev Leonid, Chubenko Semion). We created our own ost and art (except tileset - we used this one: https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-castle).
